# strong

𓍊 mighty νεκτά in 𓍊𓎟𓆑 Νεκτάνεβις Nectanebis

𒆗 𒄥 𒄨

𒆗 šedu 𒌜 šedu₂ 𒀆 šedu₃ 精神 せいしん seishin სავსე savse (strong) spirit 𒆗 šedu 𒌜 šedu₂ 𒀆 šedu₃ #duššû душа́ dušá "spirit" дух dux duchᵒⁿ

𒆗 šeduⁿ ≈ ˢdan

𒆗 dan 𐀪 don djin jini 정신 jeongsin "spirit"
𒆗 dan 𐀪 don djin تىن tin тын tïn theon 天 tiān "spirit" 𒆗 dan 𐀪 don djin tï̄n 𒋾 tınç tînc 𓋹 𓈖 𓐍 dinc dȳnç Ding "spirit, breath, life"

𒆗 šeduⁿ ≈ ˢdan

𒀉 = 𒐑 𒁕 sh.da in 𒀉𒉣𒅅 •šta₂nun-ĝal₂ strong 𒀉𒉣𒄄𒀀 •šta₂nun-gi-a strength 𒀉 = 𒁕 𒐑 da.sh 𐀈-𐀰 do-so doso ≈ 𓂞 ⇔ dosis

𒆗 dannu daniš ⲇⲩⲛⲁⲧⲟⲥ δυνατός dynatós "strong" <> dynasty

𒆗 ˢdannu strong <> standing 𒆗 ˢdannu тыхджын ˢtyxǵyn 𒋾 ˢtınç 𒆗𒎙 ˢdan-niš strongᵘˢ •fortement
𒆗𒉌𒅖 ˢdan-ni-iš 𓂧 𓈖 𓋴 𓍖 𓊌 dense
𒁕𒉌𒅖 ˢda-ni-iš stämmig 𒁕𒀭𒉌𒅖 ˢda-an-ni-iš danniš 𒁺𒌦𒉡 ˢdu-un-nuᵍ ˢdunnu strong ≈ 𒆗 𒉪

medina "stronghold" jurisdiction don

𒆗 kal kala kalag < GURUŠ groß great < Kraft 𓌂 𓐍 𓂡

𓂝 𓂞 𓂦 𓂡 ء ي د ʾ-y-d !

𓋴 𓋴 𓌂 𓅓 strong ⇔ Kraft

𓋴 𓄊 𓂋 𓂡 strengthen ( make strong, powerful) 𓋴s𓄊t𓂋r𓂡

𓋴 𓌗 𓂋 𓎗 𓅱 𓆓 𓏛 strengthen ⇔ 𓌗 STRing 𓋴 𓂋 𓌌 𓌗 strap strong

𓋴 𓌗 𓂋 𓎗 𓅱 𓆓 𓏛 secure!

𓄊 𓋴 𓂋 𓂡 •Kraft (strong, strength, power)

𒅆𒀧𒄩𒀝 ši-il-ha-ak stark "strong" (𒅆𒅋𒄩𒀝) vs 𒅖𒌇𒊏 iš-tuk-ra a¬stark schwach

𓂧 𓈖 𓋴 𓍖 𓊌 dense 𒆗𒉌𒅖 danniš 𒁕𒉌𒅖 strong => ú-dannina 𒌑𒆗𒉌𒈾 strenthen 𓂧≈str?

𒆗 kal kala kalag < GURUŠ groß great < Kraft to be strong, mighty, powerful to strengthen, reinforce, mend to provide for

𒆗 KALAG kuchli güclü көслө köslö strong 𒆗 KALAG köslö חָזָק khazák शक्तिशाली śaktiśālī sakkortuvoq
